name: International Fire and Rescue Services Association
memberOrga: National associations are represented by up to 3 delegates at an annual meeting that determines constitutional matters and approves actions with daily management conducted by an elected Executive of 10 persons. In Europe around 1.3 million firefighters are engaged.
goal: Exchange of good practice and technical information related to improving firefighting and fire safety
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: Development of effective civil protection arrangements and associated research into safety and security together with employment and health issues related to firefighters and overall protection of the public.
